channel.title: Making programs with VB6
channel.description:
Hi there, this tutorial shall show you how to make your first [shadow=red,left]VB6[/shadow] program.
First, make yourself comfortable. Drag your windows to where you want them to be to have a better VB6 experience.
Second, put a button and a timer on your program. Button1.Caption = Clickor! Timer1.Interval = 1000
Now, 2click on the button. Type this: Timer1.Enabled = True And finally 2click on the timer. Typer: Print("Hello world!")
Now press the play button and test it. Then go to file and hit Make Project1.exe.
HAVE FUN!

item.title: Making programs with VB6
item.dc:creator: @VB6_FTW VB6 FTW
item.description:
@VB6_FTW wrote:

Hi there, this tutorial shall show you how to make your first [shadow=red,left]VB6[/shadow] program.

First, make yourself comfortable. Drag your windows to
where you want them to be to have a better VB6 experience.

Second, put a button and a timer on your program.
Button1.Caption = Clickor!
Timer1.Interval = 1000

Now, 2click on the button. Type this:
Timer1.Enabled = True
And finally 2click on the timer. Typer:
Print(“Hello world!”)

Now press the play button and test it.
Then go to file and hit Make Project1.exe.

HAVE FUN!

Read full topic
